divs: sighting detailsthis happened about a year and 2 months ago, in november of 2005. this essentially was the impetus which led to my initiation of ufo\et research, and this is why the report hasn't been filed until now. it was about 10 p.m. on approximately november 15, 2005. i can't recall the precise date and i didn't write it down. i was with my friend driving to tim horton's (coffee chain) and something above in the night sky caught my attention as we drove through the neighbourhood to get to the coffee shop. at first i thought i saw a plane or helicopter but i kept staring at it and it seemed to be stationary and did not have blinking lights or lights in the standard setting that a plane or copter would have equipped. it had these 4 steady blue-white lights that were in a square formation on the bottom. what struck me as bizarre is that it was very low to the ground- about 250-300 feet. curious, i asked my friend to stop his truck. i got out of the truck and stared straight up at this thing. it was completely silent and moving very slowly above. my friend stayed in the truck but was staring at the object. more info on the craft: i looked carefully and could see a black circular silhouette with those four blue lights in a square pattern. they were not shining brightly but had this strange conistent glow to them, unblinking and not glittering. i watched in awe at this thing as it completely silently (it was quiet on the road we were on) passed overhead. it eventually passed behind a spruce tree so i ran over the side of the tree to get a better view. about 5 more seconds passed with the object in full view, and then it did a right turn and shot off incredibly fast- about 10 times the speed it was going. it did a 90 degree turn and shot off out of view. after this happened i had an intense mix of fright, excitement and... emotions that i can't really describe with words. to be honest it was really shocking and scary to see what happened but incredible at the same time. what i remember about the craft is that it was circular and black. the four lights did not light up the underside. they seemed succinct and had this strange steady glow to them. i have attached a paintbrush picture.
